lead_paragraph: Denis Lebedev of Russia retained his World Boxing Association cruiserweight title with a unanimous-decision victory over Youri Kalenga of France at Luzhniki Palace in Moscow.

headline.main: Russian Retains World Boxing Association Title

snippet: Denis Lebedev of Russia retained his World Boxing Association cruiserweight title with a unanimous-decision victory over Youri Kalenga of France at Luzhniki Palace in Moscow.
